about_the_game:
Welcome to Interlinked, a captivating and minimalistic strategy game that boasts surprising depth!

Embark on the challenge of connecting the expanding world to the internet through three distinct methods:





As the head of a global technology company, your role is pivotal in navigating the complexities of building a robust network capable of reaching every household. Start by strategically placing central hubs and cables while adeptly managing your research department and finances to ensure the profitability of your company.

Prepare to face off against rival technology companies vying for dominance in the market. Outpace the competition by offering a speedier connection or competitive pricing—the choice is yours! Can you ascend to the pinnacle and forge a network that will revolutionize the world?

Mastery of the delicate equilibrium between expansion and research is crucial to staying ahead. Employ cutting-edge technology and innovative strategies to establish a monopoly, but make sure that your network can seamlessly handle the ever-increasing traffic!

With colorful graphics, simple mechanics, and unlimited strategies, Interlinked is the perfect game for anyone who loves strategy and finance. Do you have what it takes to become a corporate giant? Play Interlinked now and find out!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible video card with at least 512MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Build infrastructure to connect the expanding world to the internet! Having a working strategy and great management is key to winning your competition in this capitalist environment.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Finnish
